Web Design Agency Landing Page

Click the link below to download & edit this Figma Template.

What is this?

This is a landing page design I made in Figma. I don't rmember exactly why I made this design so red but I do remember that at some point I was getting tired of making black text white background designs so I thought a little outside the box with this one.

My Goal

My goal with this website and templates like this is to distribute free design resources.

Making these design resources is free though.
